languages.text: {n}Голос из вокса Паскаля наполняется тревожными нотками.{/n} "От лица духовенства {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Марса{/g} официально инициирую свое участие в вылазке. Мне необходимо проинспектировать состояние реликвии и удостовериться, что риск ее попадания в руки еретиков равен нулю".

traits.locale_text: {n}Голос из вокса Паскаля наполняется тревожными нотками.{/n} "Я, магос Ханейманн, от лица алого духовенства {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Марса{/g} официально инициирую свое участие в вылазке. Мне необходимо проинспектировать состояние реликвии и удостовериться, что риск ее попадания в руки еретиков равен нулю".

languages.text: {n}Notes of anxiety creep into the voice that rattles from Pasqal's vox:{/n} "On behalf of the Priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, I, Magos Haneumann, am officially initiating my participation in the operation. I must inspect the state of the relic and assure myself that it is under zero risk of falling into heretic hands."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос из вокса Паскаля наполняется тревожными нотками.{/n} "От лица духовенства {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Марса{/g} официально инициирую свое участие в вылазке. Мне необходимо проинспектировать состояние реликвии и удостовериться, что риск ее попадания в руки еретиков равен нулю".

I must inspect the state of the relic and assure myself that it is under zero risk of falling into heretical hands."

I must inspect the state of the relic and assure myself that it is under zero risk of falling into heretical hands."

{n}Notes of anxiety creep into the voice that rattles from Pasqal's vox:{/n} "On behalf of the Priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, I, Magos Haneumann, am officially initiating my participation in the operation. I must inspect the state of the relic and assure myself that it is under zero risk of falling into heretic hands."

{n}Notes of anxiety creep into the voice that rattles from Pasqal's vox:{/n} "On behalf of the Priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, I, Magos Haneumann, am officially initiating my participation in the operation. I must inspect the state of the relic and assure myself that it is under zero risk of falling into heretic hands."

languages.text: {n}Ein Anflug von Nervosität kriecht in die Stimme, die ratternd aus Pasqals Vox dröhnt.{/n} "Im Namen der Priesterschaft des {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g} leite ich, Magos Haneumann, offiziell meine Beteiligung an der Operation ein. Ich muss den Zustand des Relikts inspizieren und mich vergewissern, dass keinerlei Risiko besteht, dass es in ketzerische Hände fällt."
languages.original_text: {n}Notes of anxiety creep into the voice that rattles from Pasqal's vox:{/n} "On behalf of the Priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, I, Magos Haneumann, am officially initiating my participation in the operation. I must inspect the state of the relic and assure myself that it is under zero risk of falling into heretic hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Anflug von Nervosität kriecht in die Stimme aus Pasqals Vox.{/n} "Im Namen der Priesterschaft des {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g} leite ich, Magos Haneumann, offiziell meine Beteiligung an der Operation ein. Ich muss den Zustand des Relikts inspizieren und mich vergewissern, dass keinerlei Risiko besteht, dass es in ketzerische Hände fällt."

languages.text: {n}Une pointe d'angoisse transparaît dans la voix métallique du vox de Pasqal.{/n} « Au nom du clergé de {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, moi, le magos Haneumann, annonce officiellement ma participation à cette opération. Je dois examiner l'état de la relique et m'assurer qu'elle ne risque pas de tomber entre les mains des hérétiques. »
languages.original_text: {n}Notes of anxiety creep into the voice that rattles from Pasqal's vox:{/n} "On behalf of the Priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, I, Magos Haneumann, am officially initiating my participation in the operation. I must inspect the state of the relic and assure myself that it is under zero risk of falling into heretic hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une pointe d'angoisse transparaît dans la voix du vox de Pasqal.{/n} « Au nom du clergé de {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, moi, le magos Haneumann, annonce officiellement ma participation à cette opération. Je dois examiner l'état de la relique et m'assurer qu'elle ne risque pas de tomber entre les mains des hérétiques. »

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡沙哑的声音中夹杂着焦虑。{/n}“我，贤者哈努曼，以{g|Encyclopedia:Mars}火星{/g}祭司的名义，正式开始参与此次行动。我必须检查圣物的状况，确保它不会落入异端分子之手。”
languages.original_text: {n}Notes of anxiety creep into the voice that rattles from Pasqal's vox:{/n} "On behalf of the Priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, I, Magos Haneumann, am officially initiating my participation in the operation. I must inspect the state of the relic and assure myself that it is under zero risk of falling into heretic hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的声音中夹杂着焦虑。{/n}“我，贤者哈努曼，以{g|Encyclopedia:Mars}火星{/g}祭司的名义，正式开始参与此次行动。我必须检查圣物的状况，确保它不会落入异端分子之手。”

languages.text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスからは不安気な声が漏れる。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Mars}火星{/g}の神官団を代表し、私、マゴス・ヘニュマンがこの作戦に正式に参加する。聖遺物の状態を調査して、異端の手に渡る危険性がゼロであることを保証しなければなりません」
languages.original_text: {n}Notes of anxiety creep into the voice that rattles from Pasqal's vox:{/n} "On behalf of the Priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, I, Magos Haneumann, am officially initiating my participation in the operation. I must inspect the state of the relic and assure myself that it is under zero risk of falling into heretic hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスから不安気な声が漏れる。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Mars}火星{/g}の神官団を代表し、私、マゴス・ヘニュマンがこの作戦に正式に参加する。聖遺物の状態を調査して、異端の手に渡る危険性がゼロであることを保証しなければなりません」

languages.text: {n}Un tono de ansiedad se cuela en la voz que brota del voco de Pasqal.{/n} «En nombre del Sacerdocio de {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Marte{/g}, yo, Magos Haneumann, inicio oficialmente mi participación en la operación. Debo inspeccionar el estado de la reliquia y asegurarme de que no corre ningún riesgo de caer en manos de herejes».
languages.original_text: {n}Notes of anxiety creep into the voice that rattles from Pasqal's vox:{/n} "On behalf of the Priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, I, Magos Haneumann, am officially initiating my participation in the operation. I must inspect the state of the relic and assure myself that it is under zero risk of falling into heretic hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un tono de ansiedad se cuela en la voz desde el voco de Pasqal.{/n} «En nombre del Sacerdocio de {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Marte{/g}, yo, Magos Haneumann, inicio oficialmente mi participación en la operación. Debo inspeccionar el estado de la reliquia y asegurarme de que no corre ningún riesgo de caer en manos de herejes».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksundan gelen hırıltılı sesine hafif bir endişe tınısı sızıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g} Rahipliği adına ben, Magos Haneumann, bu operasyona katılımımı resmî olarak başlatıyorum. Yadigârın vaziyetini incelemeli ve kâfirlerin eline düşme riski olmadığından bizzat emin olmalıyım."
languages.original_text: {n}Notes of anxiety creep into the voice that rattles from Pasqal's vox:{/n} "On behalf of the Priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, I, Magos Haneumann, am officially initiating my participation in the operation. I must inspect the state of the relic and assure myself that it is under zero risk of falling into heretic hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksundan gelen hırıltılı sesine hafif bir endişe tınısı sızıyor:{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g} Rahipliği adına ben, Magos Haneumann, bu operasyona katılımımı resmî olarak başlatıyorum. Yadigârın vaziyetini incelemeli ve kâfirlerin eline düşme riski olmadığından bizzat emin olmalıyım."
